situation.title: Registered partnership
situation.meta_description: Rules for entering into a civil union.

content.processed:
Rules

Under current conditions, a registered partnership can only be entered into if this step is urgent.

As an urgency may be considered:

  • case of illness of one person entering into the civil union, where there is danger in delay,
  • due to the length of validity of residence permits of foreigners who are the future partners.

The reasons must be addressed in advance with the registrar, who should accept the declaration of entry into a partnership.

Entry into a registered partnership may include the participation of only persons who will enter into a registered partnership, registrar, or interpreter if one (or both) of the couple entering into a registered partnership do not understand Czech.

Participants do not have to wear face masks when declaring the entry into a registered partnership.  

From November 23rd 2020 there can be a maximum of 20 people present at the ceremony, the condition of urgency will be no longer required.
